title: Ravetkar Group Parkside
detail: Ravetkar Group Parkside combines modern living with serene surroundings. Offering 3 and 4 BHK homes, Parkside is designed for those seeking both luxury and tranquility. These well-appointed residences feature spacious layouts, contemporary design, and high-quality finishes. Enjoy a lifestyle enhanced by lush green spaces and top-notch amenities, where every detail is crafted to provide comfort and elegance. At Parkside, Ravetkar Group brings you a perfect blend of sophistication and natural beauty, creating a home that truly stands out.
developer_detail: Since 1984, Ravetkar Group has created landmark residential, commercial, and industrial projects in and around Pune. Recently, we've focused on redeveloping older residential areas, earning the trust of the Pune community. We're also developing new projects in prime locations, continuing our commitment to shaping Pune's landscape.
city_description: Discover the vibrant heart of Pune in Erandwane, a sought-after residential haven with a rich cultural heritage. Enjoy unparalleled convenience with renowned educational institutions, bustling commercial centers, and serene green spaces at your doorstep. Experience the perfect blend of tradition and modernity in this well-connected and thriving locale. Your ideal home awaits in Erandwane.
